I 1473 P-1NS Am 1510 V-PXI-1S The 3588 T-NSF Vine, 288 N-NSF Ye Are 5210 P-2NP The 3588 T-NPN Branches. 2814 N-NPN He That 3588 T-NSM Abides 3306 V-PAP-NSM In 1722 PREP Me, 1698 P-1DS And I 2504 P-1NS-C In 1722 PREP Him, 846 P-DSM He 3778 D-NSM Bears 5342 V-PAI-3S Fruit 2590 N-ASM Much; 4183 A-ASM For 3754 CONJ Apart From 5565 ADV Me 1700 P-1GS 3756 PRT-N Ye Are Able 1410 V-PNI-2P To Do 4160 V-PAN Nothing. 3762 A-ASN

<S%G1437><s%> Unless <S%G3361><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> Abide <S%G3306><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Me, <S%G1698><s%> He Is Cast <S%G906><s%> Out <S%G1854><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Branch, <S%G2814><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Is Dried Up, <S%G3583><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Gather <S%G4863><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> A Fire <S%G4442><s%> Cast, <S%G906><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> It Is Burned. <S%G2545><s%>

In <S%G1722><s%> This <S%G5129><s%> Is Glorified <S%G1392><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%> My Father, <S%G3450><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Fruit <S%G2590><s%> Much <S%G4183><s%> Ye Should Bear, <S%G5342><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Ye Shall Become <S%G1096><s%> To Me <S%G1698><s%> Disciples. <S%G3101><s%>

These Things <S%G5023><s%> I Have Spoken <S%G2980><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Joy <S%G5479><s%> <S%G3588><s%> My <S%G1699><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> You <S%G5213><s%>, May Abide, <S%G3306><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5479><s%> Your Joy <S%G5216><s%> May Be Full. <S%G4137><s%>

This <S%G3778><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Commandment <S%G1785><s%> <S%G3588><s%> My, <S%G1699><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Ye Love <S%G25><s%> One Another, <S%G240><s%> As <S%G2531><s%> I Loved <S%G25><s%> You. <S%G5209><s%>

Greater <S%G3173><s%> Than This <S%G3778><s%> Love <S%G26><s%> No One <S%G3762><s%> Has, <S%G2192><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> One <S%G5100><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5590><s%> His Life <S%G846><s%> Should Lay Down <S%G5087><s%> For <S%G5228><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Friends <S%G5384><s%> His. <S%G846><s%>

No Longer <S%G3765><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> I Call <S%G3004><s%> Bondmen, <S%G1401><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Bondman <S%G1401><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Knows Not <S%G1492><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Is Doing <S%G4160><s%> His <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Master. <S%G2962><s%> <S%G5209><s%> But You <S%G1161><s%> I Have Called <S%G2046><s%> Friends, <S%G5384><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> All Things <S%G3956><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> I Heard <S%G191><s%> Of <S%G3844><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%> My Father <S%G3450><s%> I Made Known <S%G1107><s%> To You. <S%G5213><s%>

Not <S%G3756><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> Chose, <S%G1586><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Chose 1586 V-AMI-1S You, 5209 P-2AP And 2532 CONJ Appointed 5087 V-AAI-1S You 5209 P-2AP That 2443 CONJ Ye 5210 P-2NP Should Go 5217 V-PAS-2P And 2532 CONJ Fruit 2590 N-ASM Ye Should Bear, 5342 V-PAS-2P And 2532 CONJ 3588 T-NSM 2590 N-NSM Your Fruit 5216 P-2GP Should Abide; 3306 V-PAS-3S That 2443 CONJ 3739 R-ASN 5100 X-ASN Whatsoever 302 PRT Ye May Ask 154 V-AAS-2P The 3588 T-ASM Father 3962 N-ASM In 1722 PREP 3588 T-DSN 3686 N-DSN My Name 3450 P-1GS He May Give 1325 V-2AAS-3S You. 5213 P-2DP
These Things <S%G5023><s%> I Command <S%G1781><s%> You, <S%G5213><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Ye Love <S%G25><s%> One Another. <S%G240><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> World <S%G2889><s%> Ye Were, <S%G2258><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2889><s%> <S%G302><s%> <S%G3588><s%> World <S%G2398><s%> Would Love Its Own; <S%G5368><s%> <S%G3754><s%> But Because <S%G1161><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> World <S%G2889><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Ye Are Not, <S%G2075><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Chose 1586 V-AMI-1S You 5209 P-2AP Out Of 1537 PREP The 3588 T-GSM World, 2889 N-GSM On Account Of 1223 PREP This 5124 D-ASN Hates 3404 V-PAI-3S You 5209 P-2AP The 3588 T-NSM World. 2889 N-NSM

Remember <S%G3421><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Said 2036 V-2AAI-1S To You, 5213 P-2DP 3756 PRT-N Is Not 2076 V-PXI-3S A Bondman 1401 N-NSM Greater 3187 A-NSM-C 3588 T-GSM 2962 N-GSM Than His Master. 846 P-GSM If 1487 COND Me 1691 P-1AS They Persecuted, 1377 V-AAI-3P Also 2532 CONJ You 5209 P-2AP They Will Persecute; 1377 V-FAI-3P If 1487 COND 3588 T-ASM 3056 N-ASM My Word 3450 P-1GS They Kept, 5083 V-AAI-3P Also 2532 CONJ 3588 T-ASM Yours 5212 S-2APM They Will Keep. 5083 V-FAI-3P

But <S%G235><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> They Will Do <S%G4160><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> On Account Of <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3686><s%> My Name, <S%G3450><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3756><s%> They Know Not <S%G1492><s%> Him Who <S%G3588><s%> Sent <S%G3992><s%> Me. <S%G3165><s%>

<S%G1487><s%> If <S%G3361><s%> I Had Not Come <S%G2064><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Spoken <S%G2980><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Sin <S%G266><s%> <S%G3756><s%> They Had Not Had; <S%G2192><s%> <S%G3568><s%> But Now <S%G1161><s%> A Pretext <S%G4392><s%> <S%G3756><s%> They Have Not <S%G2192><s%> For <S%G4012><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G266><s%> Their Sin. <S%G846><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2041><s%> Works <S%G3361><s%> I Had Not Done <S%G4160><s%> Among <S%G1722><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3762><s%> No Other One <S%G243><s%>, Has Done, <S%G4160><s%> Sin <S%G266><s%> <S%G3756><s%> They Had Not Had, <S%G2192><s%> <S%G3568><s%> But Now <S%G1161><s%> Both <S%G2532><s%> They Have Seen <S%G3708><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Have Hated <S%G3404><s%> Both <S%G2532><s%> Me <S%G1691><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> My. <S%G3450><s%>

' But <S%G235><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Might Be Fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> That <S%G3588><s%> Has Been Written <S%G1125><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3551><s%> <S%G846><s%> Their Law, <S%G3754><s%> They Hated <S%G3404><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> Without Cause. <S%G1432><s%>

<S%G3752><s%> But When <S%G1161><s%> Is Come <S%G2064><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Paraclete, <S%G3875><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Will Send 3992 V-FAI-1S To You 5213 P-2DP From 3844 PREP The 3588 T-GSM Father, 3962 N-GSM The 3588 T-NSN Spirit 4151 N-NSN 3588 T-GSF Of Truth, 225 N-GSF Who 3739 R-NSN From 3844 PREP The 3588 T-GSM Father 3962 N-GSM Goes Forth, 1607 V-PNI-3S He 1565 D-NSM Will Bear Witness 3140 V-FAI-3S Concerning 4012 PREP Me; 1700 P-1GS

Also <S%G2532><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Bear Witness, <S%G3140><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> ' From The <S%G575><s%> Beginning <S%G746><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Me <S%G1700><s%> Ye Are. <S%G2075><s%>
